'''Stone Harbor Delicacies''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Stone Harbor Delicacies is obtainable from [[Licai]] in [[Liuli Pavilion]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Stone Harbor Delicacies increases the party's critical rate by '''6'''/'''9'''/'''12'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
